The transcript does not contain any greetings or casual exchanges; instead, it dives directly into discussions about VR technology advancements, historical significance, therapeutic applications, and integration with augmented reality. While these topics are interesting and relevant to VR discussions, they do not align with the core requirement of establishing a casual tone through greetings as outlined in the summary. Therefore, the scene needs to be reshot to include initial greetings and expressions of excitement before delving into detailed discussions. Feedback: Ensure that participants start with brief introductions or greetings to set a friendly tone before transitioning into more technical or thematic conversations.
